00009 // Tool to groom jets with a mass-drop filter.

00014 #include "fastjet/JetDefinition.hh"
00015 #include "AsgTools/ToolHandle.h"
00016 
00017 class JetPruner
00018 : virtual public asg::AsgTool,
00019   virtual public IJetGroomer {
00020 ASG_TOOL_CLASS(JetPruner, IJetGroomer)
00021 
00022 public:
00023 
00024   // Ctor.
00025   JetPruner(std::string name);
00026 
00027   // Dtor.
00028   ~JetPruner();
00029 
00030   // Initilization.
00031   StatusCode initialize();
00032 
00033   // Groom a jet and add result to a container.
00034   int groom(const xAOD::Jet& jin, xAOD::JetContainer& jout) const;
00035 
00036   // Dump to log.
00037   void print() const;
00038 
00039 private:  // data
00040 
00041   // Job options.
00042   std::string m_jetalg;                 // Kt, AntiKt, CamKt
00043   float m_zcut;                         // zcut: pTi, pTj > pT(i+j)
00044   float m_rcut;                         // rcut: Rij < rcut*2m/pT
00045   ToolHandle<IJetFromPseudojet> m_bld;  // Tool to build jets.
00046 
00047   // Data
00048   fastjet::JetAlgorithm m_fjalg;
00049   
00050 };
